story.iWant: I want to create a mobile-first responsive layout framework with flexible grid system and breakpoint management
story.soThat: so that I can ensure consistent, accessible, and performant user experiences across all device sizes while maintaining the portfolio's liquid glass design aesthetic
story.tasks: Create mobile-first responsive grid system, Implement breakpoint management, Build flexible container and layout components, Ensure cross-device consistency, Performance optimization for responsive design

acceptanceCriteria.criteria: CSS Grid system implements 6-breakpoint responsive design (320px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px, 1920px)
Mobile-first approach validated across all breakpoints with touch-friendly interactions
Layout containers use liquid glass effects appropriately with adaptive glassmorphism
Grid system supports planned component layouts for portfolio, articles, and projects
Responsive images scale appropriately across devices with optimized loading
Touch interactions work seamlessly with 44px minimum tap targets
